content: Works great now! I relied on this guide when I first played botw, so I went for the donor edition this time around. I think it's much better than the recipe guide from the breath companion. Very happy with the app!
replyContent: Hi Thomas, really sorry about this. Having server issues, hoping to have fixed in the next few hours. Apologies again. - JM This should now be fixed Thomas!

content: Wonderful and easy to use
replyContent: Hey Alfred! Thanks for the review, happy cooking! - JM

content: very long time and nothing to show reply: every time when open app take about 5 minute some time 10 minute seem like it loading or it connect to your server?
replyContent: Hi there, sorry you did not like the app. What is taking a long time for you? - JM Edit: I am sorry to hear that it is taking a long time to load from the server. After initial load the data should get cached to your device. Happy to investigate further if you send device info and your country over to james@jamesmcnee.co.uk

content: Great app i wish people would get this verson instead of the free verson
replyContent: Hey coldnoah yt! Thanks for leaving a review and supporting the app! Much appreciated. I am glad you like the app, happy cooking - JM

content: I'm new to BOTW and this has made the game so much easier. Thank you! I'm most definitely supporting you.
replyContent: Hey Mz Bossy! Thanks for leaving a review and indeed supporting the app! Glad to hear you are finding the app useful, and hope you are enjoying this fantastic game! Happy cooking - JM

content: The only problem I experienced was that both the name and the icon of the Standard Edition and Donator's Edition are identical. It was incredibly difficult to figure out which was the right version to uninstall. Other than that, this is a very useful app that I felt was worth donating to.
replyContent: Hey Michael! Thanks for leaving a review, and also for supporting the apps maintenance! I will take a look at the icon, as the donators edition should have a heart in the corner! Thanks again, and happy cooking - JM

content: Great way to find and remember recipes.
replyContent: Hey Joe, thanks for leaving a review and supporting the app! Glad you are finding it useful. Happy cooking - JM

content: Would be awesome if you could add elixer recipes.
replyContent: Hey Lea! Thanks for leaving a review and for supporting the application. I will look into getting elixir recipes added when I next get some free time! Thanks again, and happy cooking - JM

content: Wonderful app! Great search functions for recipes and ingredients. Only suggestions are that I'd like a thumbnail of the dish and that it's missing a few ingredients. Raw bird thigh and raw whole bird that I've noticed.
replyContent: Hey Michael, thanks for leaving a review and supporting the app! Adding dish thumbnails would be a manual process and I would need to cook each recipe to match them up; but I agree it would be a nice addition! Happy cooking - JM

content: omg you've saved me so much time for just $0.99 thank you and gl on future projects. ðŸ’™
replyContent: Hey Paris, glad you are finding the app useful! Thanks for leaving a review. Happy cooking - JM

content: pretty good app. i wish you could sort the ingredients the same way they are in game though, and put in what ingredients you have to see what you can cook.
replyContent: Hey Connor, thanks for the review and for helping to keep the servers running! I agree sorting would be good and may take a look at this if I get some time! Happy cooking - JM

content: Exactly what I was looking for, thank you.
replyContent: Hey Nathan! Glad that you have found the app useful, thanks for helping to keep the servers running! Happy cooking - JM

content: whoever designed this app deserves more than $.99 for it. it's an incredibly useful & resourceful app for one of, if not THE greatest game made. thank you for your efforts!! after my review I found that a gentleman named James created this app. many thanks, James!
replyContent: Hey Ronnie! Thanks for leaving a review, I am glad that you have found the app useful, and you are correct, it is a very good game! Thanks for supporting and keeping the servers running. Happy cooking - JM

content: i love it!! ive been looking for a app to help me with the cooking and this app is very help i give you 5 triforces out of 5
replyContent: Hey Nexs Art And Gaming, thanks for leaving a review. Glad the app has been useful to you. Happy cooking - JM

content: you've earned that .99 i use this almost as much as my actual cookbooks irl. thanks for making it easier on us :)
replyContent: Hey Svet! Thanks for reaching out and supporting the app! Glad you are finding it useful ðŸ™‚. Happy cooking - JM

content: Excellent app. I have been wasting so many ingredients trying out different recipes and elixirs for certain boosts and resistence duration. I only wish I found this app sooner not 40+ hours into the game! Def recommend for Zelda BOTW fans.
replyContent: Hey Kylie! Thanks for leaving a review. Glad to hear you are liking the app. Hope you did not waste too many ingredients!! Happy cooking - JM

content: Thank you for your hard work and dedication to the BOTW community. Wish I knew someone like you - so many games need apps like this and I always think how great it would be if I could be so amazing like JM and just create my own. Fortunately for me, my favorite game Zelda BOTW has this masterful cooking app. Good luck in your future projects and appreciate any further work you put into this excellent, five star app. Also, a low price = tremendous value. This IS the app you need for BOTW.
replyContent: Hey Matthew! Thanks for the review! I am glad that you like the app, and have found use for it. Hopefully I can get around to making a similar app for more games in the future. As always, happy cooking - JM

content: Gee whiz, guy. You responded so quickly on my review on the free version, and the app is so user-friendly, and you're clearly so active and still working on this project, I just had to go ahead and buy it. Thanks again!
replyContent: Hi (again) Brittany! Thanks for deciding to support the project. Unfortunately I don't get as much time as I would like to maintain the app, but I try when I get the time ðŸ˜€. Thanks again, and happy cooking - JM

content: You have my support.
replyContent: Hi Jeff! Thanks for leaving a review and supporting the app! Happy cooking - JM

content: Very very helpful
replyContent: Hey Olivia, thanks for leaving a review and supporting the application! Happy cooking - JM

content: Pretty damn good companion app for BotW. Would be perfect if you could filter/organize the recipes by how many hearts/ how much stamina/ how long the desired effect lasts. Then it would be perfect. :) Not a gripe, but more of a suggestion. Thank you for the cool app!
replyContent: Hey Alexander, thanks for the review! Glad you like the app, and I do agree that having sort/filter would be great and has been suggested before. I have been putting it off for a while but will hopefully implement this feature soon. Happy cooking :) - JM

content:
Hasn't been updated in months. Missing a lot of high level recipes. Just 
stick to YouTube or other sites for more recipes.
replyContent: Hi Dark Meister, new recipes are added to the app without the need for it to be updated via the play store. There is no need to update an app that is working perfectly - JM

content:
It's nice to see that someone who isn't a big faceless company sells an app 
and the money goes to self supporting. It's fantastic app so much so I had 
the free version but as the app is worth every penny I paid for the paid 
version. If you play BOTW this is the app you need keep up the good work 
and make sure the app runs smoothly ;-) :-)
replyContent: Hi Shadow Black! Thanks for the review and contribution! I am glad that you like the app, and felt compelled to help support its costs. Happy cooking - JM

content:
Good app! However, in the defence boost section of recipes there is no 
recipe for 30:00 minute high level defence boost, pls add it!
replyContent: Hey TheFlameGamer, thanks for leaving a review and also being a donator! If you have a recipe that gives a high level defence boost for 30mins, then please submit it via the app and I shall endeavour to get it added! Happy cooking - JM

content:
I only downloaded after reading the awesome reviews. The creator is really 
in touch with their base and open to input. If this helps this app be what 
it could be, then I'm down to help. Having used this app, it's worth it.
replyContent: Hey Saffron! Thanks for supporting the app and leaving a review! You're right, I am always looking to the community to help improve the project. Happy cooking - JM

content:
This app is really good got the light version 1st but seeing how well and 
helpfulness it is might as well get the paid one and help the developers in 
making this app even better keep it up guys thanks for the app
replyContent: Hey Jorge! Glad you like the app, thanks for leaving a review :). Happy cooking - JM

content:
I adore this app so much. Totally worth it and also worth donating as well. 
It's seriously only .99 cents for a donation to help the creator keep this 
app amazing. This is the best app for the game hands down, and it's 
advertising interruption free....WHAT!!!! TOO AWSOME!!!!! I have suggested 
it in my Zelda breath of the wild groups to others seeking an easy recipe 
guide. I swear I wish I found it sooner before I killed so many trees 
printing off recipe guides off line smh, but I enjoy the convenience and it 
helps not waste my food. Thank you thank you thank you so much omg. If your 
reading this review stop and just download it already you won't be 
disappointed.
replyContent: Hey Yomara! Thanks for leaving a review. Glad to hear that you like the app and find some use. Thanks for choosing to support the apps development and servers. Many thanks for recommending this in your BOTW groups, getting more and more users can only make the app better. Happy cooking. - JM

content: Great app! Just started playing botw a week ago and it's been helpful. Also no ads? Hell yeah! To anyone out there I know there's a free version but donations are what can keep this ad free and support the creator!
replyContent: Hi Christopher! Glad that you are liking the app, and thanks for supporting its continued development. Happy cooking. - JM

content: Great app. Thank you for making this.
replyContent: Hi M ARB, thanks for leaving a review, and also for supporting the app. Glad that you like it, happy cooking. - JM

content: Good app, would be great if you could filter by ingredients. But still 5*s from me  Reply to developer. What I meant was it would be great to be able to maybe select 2 or 3 ingredients at a time and then see what recipes they can be used in. But I stress what you have done is great, well made and nicely presented. that's why I was more than happy to pay.
replyContent:
Hi Aaron, thanks for leaving a review and supporting the app! Do you mean inventory search?, as you can currently search by ingredient! - JM

Edit: Ah good idea. I may look into it in the future, cheers. - JM

content: Good app. Support the person who made it
replyContent: Hi Ben! Glad you like the app, and thank you for giving me your support, it means alot.

content: Great app so far. Definitely needs a way to input your inventory, then produce an auto-search list of recipes that the user can sort by effect. Please contact me if you want help with anything. I don't have much experience with coding but at the very least can help with recipe/ingredient database management. Great start, and look forward to the future of this app. Money well spent.
replyContent: Hey Tydianin! Thanks for the review, sorry this reply is more belated than others, I wasn't notified you left a review ðŸ˜†. Unfortunately I have been extremely busy recently with my final exams, however I intend to get back to work on this app in the coming weeks and add some new features.

content: Great app, gladly got the paid version. Anyway we can submit recipies to you or add them ourselves in a future update?
replyContent: Hi Erik! Thanks for supporting the app, you certainly can submit recipes!! Just click the + at the top of the app.

content: Really handy.  Love without ads aswell hence why I bought the donators edition.   Feature request.  Ingredient locations list would really be great.
replyContent: Hey Nota! Thanks for supporting the app, I hate ads too :). I am actually working on ingredient locations at the moment hopefully should be in soon!!
